Uses of Package
BLL

  • Packages that use BLL 
    Package Description
    BLL  
    UI  
  • Classes in BLL used by BLL 
    Class and Description
    Client
    Client Record
    ClientRegister
    Lazy loading singleton
    ComponentType
    Enumeration of the different types of components used and created by the project content tree
    ContentEvent
    ContentManager tree update event argument object passed with details of the event used to notify ContentTree of tree ADDs, DELETEs, UPDATE's & MOVEs
    ContentManager
    This class managers is used for additions and removals of MediaItems from the tree structure It provides all events to the TaskList and ContentTree objects from activity from MediaItems
    File
    Store the file location and maintains a version where changed
    FileStatus
    Status of files within the vault
    MediaItem
    Media Tree interface - part of composite pattern
    MediaItemWorkFlow
    Work flow interface for Assets and Element control of operations
    MediaSource
    Origin of media
    MediaStatus
    Media asset and element status
    NodeType
    Enumeration used within the code for the node types supported Also provides text to display for each type in UI
    Project
    Defines a project
    ProjectRegister
    A singleton register for all projects
    QCReport
    QC Report
    QCReport.Fault
    Each fault in the report (1 per line of the report)
    Region
    Defines the DVD & Blu-ray disc regions
    Staff
    Defines Staff
    TaskItem
    An individual task on a MediaItem
    TaskList
    TaskList register for the project
    TaskStatus
    Status of individual tasks
    Worker
    Base class for all workers e.g.
    WorkerRegister
    Register for all worker type classes e.g.
    WorkerRoles
    Defined roles for all workers
    WorkerType
    Defined types for all workers
